column4: Is there a way to check and see if someone else is using a Nickname that you in mind you would like to register ? ?
So you could run - /msg nickserv info (Nickname I want use ) and this would give results if it's taken correct ?
correct. It says it's not registered if it isn't.
Ypu just did it with this Nick that I regetered and am using.
Is it ok to have more than one NIckname registered ?
see "/msg nickserv help group" for the preferred way of doing that.
Thanks will do and also look at other post earlier
So type in your second command in the top feenode area ?
yes. It should open up a private message window with Nickserv and send that text top it.
I did it - and got back - This nickname is registered. Please choose a different nickname, or identify via /msg NickServ identify <password>.
So I just went back there and typed in my password and it recognized me - so does that mean the Nick I'm using is registered and valid but for some reason need to check with #freenode ?
Looks like you're identified now, so whatever you did worked.
Ok - who knows - that's part of using computers in general - Garbage In - Garbage Out! sometimes - :o)
